title: Chinese team builds optical chip AI that is 100 times faster than Nvidia’s A100 - South China Morning Post
description: Chinese team builds optical chip AI that is 100 times faster than Nvidia’s A100 South China Morning Post

title: Chinese team builds optical chip AI that is 100 times faster than Nvidia’s market leader
description: Chinese scientists have unveiled an optical computing chip that outperformed Nvidia’s leading AI hardware by over a hundredfold in speed and energy efficiency – particularly for generative tasks such as video production and image synthesis.The LightGen chip was developed by a team from Shanghai Jiao Tong University and Tsinghua University, harnessing the speed of light to execute complex artificial intelligence workloads.With more than 2 million photonic neurons integrated into a compact chip,...

title: Trump’s Genesis Mission: AI Innovation vs. Budget Cuts and Critics
description: President Trump's Genesis Mission, launched in November 2025, aims to integrate AI, federal datasets, and supercomputing for breakthroughs in science, echoing the Manhattan Project. However, critics warn that his administration's budget cuts, expert exodus, and anti-science policies could undermine its success, risking U.S. innovation in a global AI race.

title: Amazon Takes On ChatGPT and Gemini With New Web-Based AI Assistant
description: Amazon has begun rolling out a web version of its next-generation Alexa+ assistant, marking its strongest push yet to position Alexa as a direct competitor to ChatGPT and Google Gemini – not just a voice in a smart speaker. For some users, typing Alexa.com into a browser now opens a full chatbot-style interface, allowing Alexa+ [...]
